data: “I recollect the time,” said the Squire, "when two women going to a ball were a big enough load for any carriage.
"I recollect the time," said the Squire, "when two women going to a ball were a big enough load for any carriage.
The Squire's Daughter: Being the First Book in the Chronicles of the Clintons
